details.title: Bills to be taken up in Lok Sabha
details.content:
• Homeopathy Central Council (Amend)
  • State Banks(Repeal & Amend)
  • Criminal Law(Amend) Insolvency and Bankruptcy Code(2nd Amend)
  • Commercial Courts,Commercial Division &Commercial Appellate Division of High Courts(Amend)

details.title: Bills to be taken up in Rajya Sabha
details.content:
• The National Council for Teacher Education (Amendment) Bill.
  • The Right of Children to Free and Compulsory Education (Amendment) Bill.

details.title: Bills to be taken up in Rajya Sabha

details.title: TDP MPs continue their protest
details.content:
TDP MPs continue their protest in Parliament demanding special status for #AndhraPradesh. pic.twitter.com/lnFeJ1VpSO

— ANI (@ANI) July 30, 2018
Rajya Sabha has been adjourned till 12 noon after uproar by TMC MPs over the National Register of Citizens.

details.title: Anurag Thakur praises citizens for giving up LPG subsidies
details.content: BJP MP Anurag Thakur praises more than one crore citizens for giving up their LPG subsidies and questions India's energy dependency on crude oil from foreign countries.

details.title: Central Government intentionally eliminated 40 lakh minorities
details.content: Central Government has intentionally eliminated more than 40 lakh religious & linguistic minorities from NRC(National Register of Citizens) which will have serious ramifications on the demography of different states adjoining Assam, PM should come to house & clarify it: Sougata Roy, TMC - (ANI)

details.title: TMC MP raises the Jio Institute's 'eminence' status in Lok Sabha
details.content: Will HRD the minister consider giving the letter of eminence to Jio Institute, asks TMC MP Sougata Roy in Lok Sabha.

details.title: Do not politicise such sensitive issues: Rajnath Singh on Assam NRC list
details.content:
Home Minister Rajnath Singh says, "Some people are unnecessarily trying to create an atmosphere of fear. This is a completely impartial report. No misinformation should be spread.This is a draft and not the final list." 

He added," justice will be served to everyone".
Lok Sabha has been adjourned till  2.15 pm.

details.title: Rajya Sabha adjourned for the day
details.content: The Upper House which reconvened after 2 pm has been adjourned for the day after uproar over National Register of Citizens .

Home Min categorically said that govt has no role in it, the entire process was carried out under SC's direction. The draft is not final, people can still file their claims. Opposition particularly Congress is trying to politicise the issue: MoS PMO Jitendra Singh on #NRCAssam pic.twitter.com/Mgbt6oL4O5

— ANI (@ANI) July 30, 2018
Lok Sabha resumes discussion on Homeopathic Central Council (Amendment) Bill.

details.title: Lok Sabha passes 'The Homoeopathy Central Council (Amendment) Bill, 2018'
details.content: Amendments to The Homoeopathy Central Council Act, 1973 bill which was moved by Union Minister Shripad Yesso Naik has been passed by the Lower house.

details.title: Lok Sabha takes up The Criminal Law (Amendment) Bill, 2018 for discussion.
details.content: The bill seeks to provide death penalty to those convicted of raping girls below the age of 12 years.

details.title: Lok Sabha passes the Criminal Law (Amendment) Bill
details.content: The bill which was moved for consideration and passage by Minister of State for Home Kiren Rijiju was passed by the Lower House.
Lok Sabha adjourned after passing Criminal Law amendment Bill. Both Houses will convene on Tuesday at 11.00 AM.
